title: Karunanidhi slams Lanka for raking up Kudankulam nuclear power plant issue
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana DMK President and former Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Muthuvel Karunanidhi  slammed Sri Lanka for raking up the Kudankulam Nuclear Power Project issue, saying it had been there for many years and India’s Southern neighbour’s protests now cannot be accepted….
